publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-242 Margo MacDonald: Congratulations to Ian Edmondâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Ian Edmond on creating a new Commonwealth record in winning the silver medal for the 200 metres breaststroke at the World Swimming Championships and extends its appreciation of his achievement to the coaches and swimmers in Scotland whose dedication and application are raising standards at all levels in Scottish swimming.
S2M-242 Congratulations to Ian Edmond (lodged on 29 July 2003) Christine Grahame*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-242 Congratulations to Ian Edmond (lodged on 29 July 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-242 Congratulations to Ian Edmond (lodged on 29 July 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-242 Congratulations to Ian Edmond (lodged on 29 July 2003) Linda Fabiani*
